item.title: Bureaucracy holds back Los Angeles’s wildfire recovery
item.description: Politicians promised regulatory reform after the blazes but delivered administrative purgatory.

item.title: Trump’s immigration tactics repel voters. Can Democrats attract them?
item.description: If their plan is just to rely on Trump’s overreach, then they’ll be repeating Biden’s mistakes.

item.title: What killed print media — and what died with it
item.description: The waning of newsprint is about cultural changes more momentous than digital publishing’s arrival.

item.title: Is this the president we’ve been waiting for?

item.description: Anyone surprised by her embrace of big government isn’t paying attention to how the GOP is changing.

item.title: Are these young Republicans the future? If so, the party’s in trouble.
item.description: 17 of the Republicans’ 26 targeted districts are at least 40 percent non-white. Old strategies won’t work.
